Config.AutoWarp.Name: Auto Warp for 2P
Config.AutoWarp.Tooltip: If enabled, will automatically warp you if there is only one other player. Disable to force show the friend selection menu.
WarpTotemFriend.Name: Warp Totem: Friend
WarpTotemFriend.Description: Warp directly to another farmer. Consumed on use.
Error.NoOtherFarmers: No other farmers are available to warp to
